resources.string: If you want to meet with your friend secretly, please set a password:
This diary will become your best friend, would you like to give a nick name to your new friend:
If you do not want to give, just slide to the next.\nYou can slide back to define it before end of guide.
Now, your new friend\'s name is
You do not set a name
You set a secret word to meet your friend
You do not need secret digits to meet your friend
If you are not satisfied, you can slide back to modify.\nIf everything is ok, you can enter the room of you friend\'s
Please enter you secrete word to unlock the door to your friend!
